title: OpenAI launches parental controls for ChatGPT after teen’s death
description: The update comes in the wake of mounting pressure for the artificial intelligence startup to make changes to its chatbot, which has amassed over 700 million users since its launch in late 2022.
content:
By Rachel Metz, Bloomberg
OpenAI is launching parental controls for ChatGPT, which it announced following a lawsuit alleging a teenager who died by suicide this spring relied on the popular chatbot as a coach.

description: Finbold turned to OpenAI’s latest artificial intelligence model, ChatGPT-5, to identify two likely Bitcoin killers in 2026.
content:

title: Debt is fueling the next wave of the AI boom
description: For aspiring artificial-intelligence competitors such as Oracle, much rides on debt and hope.

title: German airline to cut 4,000 jobs by 2030, use AI to boost profits
description: Lufthansa Group said Monday that it would shed 4,000 jobs by 2030 with the help of artificial intelligence.
content: Lufthansa Group said Monday that it would shed 4,000 jobs by 2030 with the help of artificial intelligence, digitalization and consolidating work among member airlines — even as the company reported strong demand for air travel and predicted stronger... [1596 chars]

title: Netanyahu Discusses AI in Private Meeting With Tech Investors
description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu met with US tech executives and investors in New York on Sunday to discuss the prospects for using artificial intelligence to boost his country’s economy and military capabilities, according to people familiar with the matter.

title: Netanyahu Engages with US Tech Investors on AI Revolution
description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu recently met with US tech investors in a private discussion focused on artificial intelligence, aiming to leverage AI's potential for Israel's tech landscape, according to Bloomberg News.

title: How AI meets the Goddess in Kolkata
description: A former bureaucrat’s fascination with art created by artificial intelligence has turned a Durga Puja pandal into an art gallery with glowing canvases.
